name: Environment
description: The context and how it is changing

name: Situational awareness
description: Our level of understanding of the environment

name: Stage
description: Of evolution e.g. Genesis, Custom, Product, Commodity

name: Component
description: A single entity in a map

name: Position
description: Position of a component relative to the anchor in a chain of needs

name: Need
description: Something a higher level system requires

name: Capability
description: High level needs you provide to others

name: Flow
description: Transfer of money, risk & information between components

name: Climate
description: Rules of the game, patterns that are applied across contexts

name: Doctrine
description: Approaches which can be applied regardless of context
